page.title: 18A TEENAGER IN EDGEWORTH
page.content: He, his parents and 2 sisters have lived in Edgeworth for 5 years. He is {15 years old}and his hobbies are {scrambling and gardening.}He has no young friends of his age in the village.{He has 2 jobs, a paper round {and he cuts the church yard grass. Every morning he gets to school by coach leaving at 8.15am. He attends {secondary school}in Eastcombe. He lives in an old house which used to be a barn. There is no entertainment in the village but a mobile library comes fortnightly.He has 2 dogs, 2 cats, hens and sheep. His mother takes children to Miserden school and brings them back in the afternoon. When he leaves school he wants to work on a farm and{he likes living in the {village.
